tool_description: Coordinates logistical requirements between venue, vendors, and event timeline including delivery schedules, setup spaces, equipment needs, and service coordination.

venue_details.description: Venue information including address, layout, restrictions, and facilities

event_timeline.description: Detailed event timeline with key milestones

backup_plans_needed.description: Whether backup contingency plans should be included

coordination_meeting_required.description: Whether a pre-event coordination meeting is needed

error_messages: Venue information insufficient: venue_details must include address, layout, and basic facility information.
Vendor logistics data missing: Unable to retrieve logistical requirements for one or more selected vendors.
Timeline conflict detected: Event timeline conflicts with vendor setup/breakdown requirements.
Venue capacity exceeded: The combined vendor requirements exceed venue capacity or capabilities.
usage: Provide venue_details, selected_vendors, and event_timeline. Optionally specify delivery_restrictions, special_requirements, backup_plans_needed, and coordination_meeting_required. Creates comprehensive logistics coordination plan.

delivery_schedule.description: Detailed delivery and setup timeline for all vendors

potential_conflicts.description: Identified potential logistical conflicts or issues

contingency_plans.description: Backup plans for identified risk scenarios

coordination_summary.description: Executive summary of logistics coordination requirements
